title: Open Source Developer Revenue Streams
description: Explore the various revenue streams available for open source developers, including sponsorships, donations, crowdfunding, bounties, consulting, dual licensing, training, and merchandise. Learn how developers sustain themselves while contributing to the open source community.
keywords: open source, developer revenue, sponsorship, crowdfunding, bounties, consulting, dual licensing, training, workshops, merchandise, GitHub Sponsors, Open Collective, Bountysource, Gitcoin, MySQL, MongoDB
